page.title: 08Mrs P******'s Life
page.content: Mrs P****** is more than 70 years old and has lived in Esholt for most of her life.She went to school there,and her grandfather was in charge of building the sewage works.In her early life she was a telephonist but she is now a voluntary worker at the village institute,which was built in memory of the four men of Esholt who died in the First World War.The institute is now used for part of the time to sell refreshments to the tourists,who come to the village especially on Sundays and Wednesdays.Mrs P****** likes to see the tourists coming, but not too many at once, as they make a lot of extra work for her.She wouldn't like to live anywhere else unless she were forced to move,and then she would want to move down south,right away from the area.
